tool.name: SAGA.sim_hydrology.3
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArraySHAPES False isArrayDEM False output_data_OUTPUT $output_data_OUTPUT output_data_RETENTION $output_data_RETENTION name SAGA.sim_hydrology.3 SHAPES $SHAPES DEM $DEM INTERPOL $INTERPOL SLOPECORR $SLOPECORR prefer $prefer response $response outputType_OUTPUT $OutputSection_OUTPUT.outputType_OUTPUT transmissionMode_OUTPUT $OutputSection_OUTPUT.transmissionMode_OUTPUT outputType_RETENTION $OutputSection_RETENTION.outputType_RETENTION transmissionMode_RETENTION $OutputSection_RETENTION.transmissionMode_RETENTION

param.name: SHAPES
param.label: Plot Holes
param.help: Plot Holes The following data types are allowed in the txt file: json, xml, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml

param.name: DEM
param.label: Elevation
param.help: Elevation The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff, x-ogc-envi

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_OUTPUT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_OUTPUT
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_RETENTION
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_RETENTION
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Water Retention Capacity. Plot hole input data must provide five attributes for each soil horizon in the following order and meaning:<br/>horizon depth, TF, L, Ar, Mo.
